name: HDR
body:
### Genesis Framework
Extends core WordPress functionalities by exposing and then enhancing specific functionalities beyond their native purpose. This type of development requires a parent and child theme relationship. We would develop the parent theme using the framework for functionality and create "skin" child themes with CSS styles for design/modification.

Pros | Cons
------------ | -------------
Framework + Starter Theme | Added cost $59.95
Themes can be used multiple times for clients |  Framework needs to be updated upon new versions
Mobile responsive |  Learning curve - takes time to learn
Multi-language |  Dependent on parent/child theme relationship
Customizations wonâ€™t disappear (one-click software upgrade) | Wordpress needs to be updated
Speeds up development |  
Code library / extended functionalities |  
Support |  
Yoast SEO Plugin |  


### FoundationPress Wordpress Starter Theme 
Built with Foundation 5, giving you all the power and flexibility you need to build complex, mobile friendly websites without having works w to start from scratch. Uses wordpress core files for theme development. 

Pros | Cons
------------ | -------------
Open source | Wordpress needs to be updated
Themes can be used multiple times for clients |  
Mobile responsive |  
Speeds up development |   
Already using this framework |  
GitHub / Community Support |  
Yoast SEO Plugin | 

### Redux (advanced theme options panel)
Has all the code included to build out a full featured options panel. We build the options directly into the theme as a base that could be used across all our themes. Offers other advanced templating features.

Pros | Cons
------------ | -------------
Easy to use for customers | Wordpress needs to be updated
Used across all themes for modification |  Framework needs to be updated upon new versions
Completely Brandable |  
Cross-Browser Compatible |   
Limitless Flexibility / Validations |  
Open source |  
Clean code for customization |  
Support |

Standard payment gateway Mijireh |  Mijireh takes 0.5% transaction fee
Hosting solution + security taken care of |  Install Apps to get more use of platform

E commerce solutions

Open Source / Powers 30% online stores | Only 5 free themes by WooTheme developers (50+ paid starting at $79, purchase all for $399)

Standard payment gateway Mijireh |  Mijireh takes 0.5% transaction fee
